
                            
                            <p>这种老破小小区，高德地图上都没法具体标注，以前点个外卖，都要出去等着拿，现在京东能获取实时定位地址，再也不怕外卖找不到地方了<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/24/131149bwdbpmbdsnouju8o.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/24/131149bwdbpmbdsnouju8o.jpg"> </p>
